newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Columbus, Ga..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Columbus, Ga..

text.p: SEALED BIDS will be received in the Conference Room of the Department of Finance, 100 Tenth Street, 5th Floor,
Columbus, Georgia, 31902 and publicly opened at 11:00 A.M. on Tuesday,
for all, but not part of $12,500,000 in the principal amount of Columbus, Georgia, Water and Sewerage Revenue Bonds Series 1997 (the

The Bonds will be issued in fully registered form in denominations of $5,000 or any integral multiple thereof, as requested by the purchaser or registered owner thereof, as applicable. The Bonds will be dated April 1, 1997, and interest will be payable semiannually on May 1 and November 1 of each year beginning November 1, 1997 (first interest payment is for seven months), until maturity at such rate or rates of interest as are fixed by the successful bidder. The principal of the bonds will be paid annually beginning May 1 in the years 2011 to 2020.

The bonds are a special obligations of Columbus, Georgia, secured by a first lien on and payable solely from the net revenues of the water and sewerage system of Columbus, on a parity with previously issued Series 1985, 1988, 1991, 1992 and Series 1993 Bonds, as more fully described in the Preliminary Official Statement.
Additional Information: A Preliminary Official Statement in a form deemed final, a Notice of Sale and Official Bid Form has been mailed to a list of prospective bidders.

Additional copies of such information is available upon request to Joseph E. Lay, Evensen Dodge, Inc., 1010 Monarch Plaza, 3414 Peachtree Road, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30326, telephone (404) 233-0292 or Fax number 404-261-4469, the Financial Advisor.
